name: Fairy Tag: A Game Of Divinities
name_original: Fairy Tag: A Game Of Divinities
description:
Beware the Cat Sith ! In this party game for four, Fairy folk must run away from the Cat Sith chasing them. Those mischievous creatures can’t stop themselves from playing with it.



In this game of pursuit, each player is a member of the fairy folk from the celtic mythology. A fae shapeshifts into the dreadful Cat Sith, a dangerous predator to the fairy folk. They must chase their friends and touch it, morphing their victim into the Cat and take back their original form.



Join the fairy folk in this children’s game adaptation. Pick your color and get in this mythic chase with your friends on a single screen.

A UNION BETWEEN CHILDREN’S GAME AND CELTIC MYTHOLOGY

Fairy Tag is a party game for 3 to 4 players, in which players fight in a race for score. Two roles are available, Cat Sith or Fairy. The Cat Sith must catch a Fairy to exchange its role with them.

GAIN MOST POINTS

Fairies must twirl around the Cat Sith to gain maximum points. The more you play with fire, the better your score will be. But don’t let the Cat Sith touch you, or else it will take all your accumulated score.

CUSTOMIZATION OF GAME ROUND

Players can customize their avatar in game amidst the Fae people. Length of a round is personalized, as well as the effects in game, like theft of points.

DYNAMIC PLAYGROUND

Diverse areas of the game are trapped and complicate the task of the players. Beware of the remains of an old mill, and avoid getting stuck in the river’s mud.

MAGICAL POWERS

The Fae people are branded with multiple magical powers to unleash against the cat, or other fairies.

__________

Playable solely with joypad (for now)
